name: Device control_on/off
description: Provides an on/off toggle control for a single smart device. Use this to display the power status of a device (e.g., light, air conditioner, smart plug) and allow the user to turn it on or off. It can also show secondary states like brightness.
examples: Turn on the living room light.
Check the status of my smart plug.

component_title.description: A title for the context, usually the location of the device (e.g., 'Living Room', 'Bedroom').

text_heading.description: The specific name of the device being controlled (e.g., 'Main Light', 'Air Conditioner').

text_description.description: The brightness level of the device, if applicable (e.g., for a light). Typically an integer from 0-100.

power.description: The current power state of the device. `true` for on, `false` for off.
